<style>
.form-inline * {margin-right: 1rem;}.header{margin:20px 0}nav ul.nav-pills li{background-color:#333;border-radius:4px;margin-right:10px}.col-sm-12{margin-bottom:20px;border-radius:6px;background-color:#f5f5f5;padding:20px}.row .col-sm-3:last-child,.row .col-sm-6:last-child{margin-right:0}footer{padding:20px 0;text-align:center;border-top:1px solid #bbb}
</style>
    <title>Scaffold</title>
  </header>
  <body>
    <main class="container">
      {}
 </main>
  <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.2.1.slim.min.js " integrity="sha384-KJ3o2DKtIkvYIK3UENzmM7KCkRr/rE9/Qpg6aAZGJwFDMVNA/GpGFF93hXpG5KkN" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
<script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/js/bootstrap.min.js " integrity="sha384-JZR6Spejh4U02d8jOt6vLEHfe/JQGiRRSQQxSfFWpi1MquVdAyjUar5+76PVCmYl" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
  </body>
</html>
